abstract.text: List all categories on the App Store, including the category and subcategory hierarchy.

inlineContent.text: An error occurred with your request.
Use this endpoint to retrieve the list of available App Store categories and subcategories. Associate an app with categories using the
The first example retrieves the full category and subcategory hierarchy in one request. The second example retrieves just the top-level categories for macOS apps.

content.text: Get All App Categories and Subcategories
Get All Top-Level Categories that Apply to macOS Apps

abstract.text: Automate the tasks you perform on the Apple Developer website and in App Store Connect.
A response that contains a list of App Category resources.
The error details that an API returns in the response body whenever the API request isnt successful.
List all categories on the App Store, including the category and subcategory hierarchy.
List all App Store subcategories that belong to a specific category.

abstract.text: Update the App Store categories and sub-categories for your app.
